content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by Roopa Ganguly

Roopa Ganguly is an Indian actress, playback singer, and politician known for her work in Hindi and Bengali cinema and television. She has received numerous accolades for her contributions to Indian entertainment, including the National Film Award for Best Female Playback Singer for Abosheshey (2011). She gained widespread recognition for portraying Draupadi in Mahabharat, a role that made her one of Indian televisionâ€™s most iconic figures.
National Film Awards
for rendering her voice in Aditi Roy's Bengali film Abosheshey (2012)}}]]
